def_en: A martyr is someone who is killed or made to suffer greatly because of their religious or political beliefs, and is admired and respected by people who share those beliefs.

def_cn: (因宗教或政治信仰)处死，使殉难，折磨
def_en: If someone is martyred, they are killed or made to suffer greatly because of their religious or political beliefs.

def_cn: (为博取同情或赞赏的)假装受苦者，诉苦者，乞怜者
def_en: If you refer to someone as a martyr, you disapprove of the fact that they pretend to suffer, or exaggerate their suffering, in order to get sympathy or praise from other people.

def_cn: 深受…之苦者;受…折磨的人
def_en: If you say that someone is a martyr to something, you mean that they suffer as a result of it.
